about_the_game:
Design the perfect defence system for the city in this physics-based game. Stop the falling celestial objects with turrets, fire, lightning, portals and more! 60+ levels that will challenge your ingenuity and creativity.

Falling Stars is a building puzzle game where players design the defence system of a city to protect it from falling celestial objects. It's a mix between a tower defense and a puzzle game, with physics that resembles a pinball machine.

+60 levels

Each new level will bring new challenges and the designs to pass them will need to be more complex. Each new world will add a new object that you can build that will add a new mechanic and a new way of challenging you.

Infinite solutions.

Our puzzles can be solved in infinite ways and they encourage players creativity. Create an efficient and clean solution, or a messy and overengineer one. The sky is the limit!

Physics are fun!

Sit back and watch the chaos produced by the objects falling, bouncing and exploding!

Rethink and iterate.

You can modify your buildings endlessly until reaching your perfect design. All levels will save your solution so you can always come back and tinker with them at any moment.
